F

findWord(char[][], int[], String[]) - Static method in class WordSearch
Determines if a hidden word was found in the position of the given move.

I

isHidden(char[][], String) - Static method in class WordSearch
Determines if word is hidden in the puzzle, verticaly or horizontally, forwards or backwards.
isValidGame(char[][], String[]) - Static method in class WordSearch
Determines if the puzzle is valid, that is, all given words are hidden in the puzzle.
isValidMove(int[], int, int) - Static method in class WordSearch
Determines if the given move is valid.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class WordSearch
Main Procedure

P

printPuzzle(char[][], String[]) - Static method in class WordSearch
Prints the puzzle and the number of hidden words.

R

readMove(Scanner, int, int) - Static method in class WordSearch
Reads the player's next move through the given scanner and determines if said move is valid.

W

WordSearch - Class in <Unnamed>
This class, WordSearch, with the help of the PuzzleReader class and a Puzzle text file (see PuzzleReader Docs), lets the user play a game of word search.
WordSearch() - Constructor for class WordSearch
